CatDescriptText: Mr. Andrew Gatewood, 209 Maple Avenue, Clairton, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. A1 question reads: "Do you think people follow political leadership more than religious leadership? Why?" answer reads: "I think most of the people follow the politician. I think that the reason is because they figure that he can help them in the long run, more so than the minister."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Andrew Gatewood, wearing hat with plaid band, moustache, and diamond stripe pattern knit sweater, standing on Liberty Avenue across from the May Building, with pedestrians, automobiles, and sign reading "Mellon Bank"
